creator: kirici
descriptionHtml:
This Hotspot , which has also a widget, will allow you to turn on the portable WiFi hotspot on your Android smartphone with a touch. İt is easy to use , total free and you can create your personal hotspot.

How to use:

1) share Wifi Hotspot with many people without password and Activate your WiFi Hotspot

2) Share Wifi Hotspot with password
- Type your Wifi HotSpot name.
- Type your password.
- Click save button.
- Activate your Wifi Hotspot.

title: Mobile Hotspot

creator: kirici
descriptionHtml:
SHARE INTERNET BY TURNING YOUR PHONE INTO A MOBILE HOTSPOT PORTABLE WIFI


Share your internet connection simply with devices nearby with the Mobile Hotspot app. Turn your phone into a portable wifi router that tethers the internet while giving you amazing control.

PERSONAL MOBILE HOT SPOT WITH WIDGET, BATTERY & DATA LIMIT, TIMER AND MORE


Install now and set up a mobile wifi hotspot with one tap (you can share a connection without or with a password). Even more, our free personal hotspot app comes with a widget for even faster internet sharing.

HOTSPOT TIMER


⏲️ Unlike other free hotspot apps, Mobile Hotspot gives you the ability to set hotspot timers. When used the hotspot automatically turns off at the end of the predefined 5 minutes, 15 minutes, 30 minutes, or any custom time set by you.

SET DATA LIMIT


📶 Our security hotspot app allows you to control the shared mobile data through the hotspot connection. If you use the data limit, the app will automatically turn off when the user reaches the predefined data limit of 50MB, 100MB, 150MB, or a data limit set by you.

SET BATTERY LIMIT


🔋 When you set a battery limit, our personal privacy hotspot will turn off automatically when the phone reaches predefined battery levels such as 10%, 15%, 20%, or the battery level set by you.

SCHEDULE A MOBILE HOTSPOT CONNECTION


🗓️ Mobile Hotspot is the only internet hotspot app that allows you to set a time when the mobile hotspot will turn on/off automatically.

INTERNET SPEED TEST


🚀 Doubting that you don’t have the best hotspot connection? Well, you can easily test the internet speed within our personal hotspot free app.

SHARE AN INTERNET CONNECTION VIA QR CODE


📤 Don’t want to give a password to share a connection? Well, you can share a QR code that others can scan to connect to your mobile internet.

SEE ALL CONNECTED DEVICES


📱💻 Our mobile hotspot app can be shared as hotspot for iPhone, android devices, computers, and laptops. If you share it with multiple people, you can see the IP and Mac addresses of all connected devices, and even give a name to each connected device (only available in Android 11 or later).

MOBILE HOTSPOT APP FEATURES:


- set mobile hotspot and tethering
- support Bluetooth, USB, and Ethernet tethering
- QR code mobile hotspot sharing
- set data and battery limit to automatically turn off the mobile hotspot
- set timer to automatically turn off the mobile hotspot
- schedule mobile hotspot connections
- test your internet speed
- see all connected devices

If you are looking for a simple, fast, stable, and feature-rich mobile hot spot app that works you are at the right place.

✅Transform your phone into a portable Wifi – download Mobile Hotspot for FREE
